newsitem.title: USA: CheckFree in processing deal with Schwab.
newsitem.headline: CheckFree in processing deal with Schwab.

text.p: CheckFree Corp said Wednesday it agreed to provide bill payment processing for the customers of Charles Schwab & Co Inc.
The terms of the deal were not disclosed.

Schwab, the financial services firm, said it will allow its customers to pay bills through its Web site or by touch-tone telephone while CheckFree will offer the bill payment services and technical support.
